extendedInfo.description: Caffeine Level History and Projection chart now available in full version!Tracks your current level of caffeine.  Simply record each drink you consume.  Accounts for the natural metabolism of the caffeine in eachdrink over time.Feel free to rate as you see fit, but please suggest features and bug fixes via email to:rogan.software@gmail.comThanks!  Features: * Set your desired caffeine zone with notifications! * Share to Facebook, Twitter, ... * Display drink sizes in oz. or ml. * Add custom drinks * Caffeine metabolism algorithm takes into account factors such as: weight, pregnancy, and use of oral contraceptives.

reviews.title: Helpful
reviews.comment: As an American I like a program that measures in my units! It needs better tea numbers, though. 5 mg/oz is OK for green tea or iced tea but 9 mg/oz is more realistic for hot black tea.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Could\'ve been more intuitive..
reviews.comment: The interface should work more like AlcoDroid. As of the current version, it\'s simply not intuitive enough to gain momentum in the Market.
reviews.author: PC-Bj\303\270rn Mathisen

reviews.title: Simple and Informative
reviews.comment: I love this app.  Great for finals when you need to maintain optimum caffeine levels.  This thing alerts you when you drop below a set threshold!! (above 200mg is optimum for mental performance)  How awesome is that?! You can also add or customize default drink settings (I drink my coffee strong so this was a big deal to me).  I admit this app looks boring and not very eye catching, but the information is what counts. It could also use a help section to explain the finner details of the app.
reviews.author: Isaac Hatton

reviews.title: Good idea but...
reviews.comment: The data just deletes by itself...uninstalling. HTC Inc
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Power hog
reviews.comment: My htc amaze 4g gets quite hot when using this. Based on exponential decays, not really something I need an app to tell me. It was fun for ten minutes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: When I add a soda it says 0 or 1mg. Which would defeat the purpose!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work
reviews.comment: When I add a second cup of coffee it is always 1 or 2mg making the program useless.  Droid
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its okay
reviews.comment: Just wish I knew everything in detail. Still a bit confused.
reviews.author: Avian P

reviews.title: Useful!
reviews.comment: For a free app, this is great.  Considering the paid version as well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks promising
reviews.comment: Actually found the units from settings, trying this :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice idea.
reviews.comment: I didn\'t change the setting for my weight till after adding drinks. The app won\'t recalculate the results, though.
reviews.author: Gabriel Bodeen

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: This app is decent but is missing the option for caffeine gum and pills.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looks promising.
reviews.comment: Once its more polished and some additional features get added, ill gladly do 4-5 stars and buy it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: @endospores: You can fully customize drinks
reviews.comment: @Will: Drink size preference can be in oz or ml - I will plan to add third drink size units option \"shot\" in future version.  Thanks for the input, and let me know if you have other specific examples of things I can improve.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works fine but seriously lacks customization of drinks. 13.5 mg of caffeine in a cup of black coffee? Only in the US.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Shots necessary!
reviews.comment: Would agree that a \'shots\' measure for espresso is necessary! I just had 1 shot/44ml, and it\'s confused about my caffeine intake. Love the idea though, nicely done :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Feels not quite polished.
reviews.comment: For now uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty poor
reviews.comment: Should be able to add intake by shot not oz. It\'s a big world outside America guys
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Imperial units only
reviews.comment: Imperial units only for weight
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Extremely lite...
reviews.author: A Google User
